hackathon-description-text: The War of Coders is here - Enter the Swiggy Hackathrone! Battle it out for the coding throne in Swiggy's 1st open stack hackathon. Declare your allegiances to the various houses, assemble your army, apply and hack it out at Swiggy's cool office and be the ONE true ruler of the Swiggysphere!
hackathon-rules:
Rules:
: Your m/c and you are best pals so don't leave her home - bring your own device.
: It's simple - 2 <= size(team) <= 4
 : so don't copy or steal, just hack! :)
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=4/1, Bannerghatta Main Rd, Bhavani Nagar, Suddagunte Palya, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560029, India

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Relevant to Swiggy's discovery and logistics platform. Bonus points for Customer Centricity.
Marketplace impact the hack can create.

hackathon-location-address: 4/1, Bannerghatta Main Rd, Bhavani Nagar, Suddagunte Palya, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560029, India
hackathon-description-header: War of coders in the land of always winter!
